all_files = glob.glob(os.path.join(path, "*.csv"))     
df_from_each_file = (pd.read_csv(f) for f in all_files)
df   = pd.concat(df_from_each_file, ignore_index=True)
source.9abc83d7:

source.27fd8f6a:
Dataset form mygov.in

MyGov has been established as Government of India’s Citizen Engagement Platform which collaborates with multiple Government bodies/ Ministries to engage with citizens for policy formulation and seeks the opinion of people on issues/ topics of public interest and welfare. Since its launch on 26th July 2014, by Hon’ble Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, MyGov has more than 17.5 million registered users. Almost all Government Departments leverage MyGov platform for their citizen engagement activities, consultations for po.
